metadata.title: Earthquake '64 - EVOS Database

creators.name: Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Division of Support, Land Records Information Section

metadata.description: Data Type: Ocean/Coasts ;   The dataset depicts the contours of geomorphic displacement measured in feet from the 1964 Earthquake at a 1:2,000,000 scale. Displacement ranges from approximately -8 feet to 35 feet near Montague Island. This data layer was intended as a resource for use in the damage assessment and restoration efforts of the EVOS geoprocessing group.
